name: DATING BREAD
description:
Why choose people to date when you can choose BREAD?
That's what this game is about.

An incomplete version because I wanted to submit it to NaNoRenO 2022; more to come!


FEATURES

In this game you will be able to find:

3 endings (the bad ending is the only one already available)
6 bread choices
puns BUNS because puns were out of stock, sorry.  maybe next time.


BEWARE

This is an early version of the game. There will be bugs. And lack of content in some routes.

So... if I were you, I'd wait a bit more to play it. But if you can't wait, maybe try to get different reactions from the bakery owner...


SPECIAL THANKS

Special thanks to the voice actors who made the theme song a possibility:

- Caila Dela Cruz

- Chandler Branson

- Dylan Keeler

- Gimo

- Max Herzfeld

- Meredith Nudo

- Natalia Makarski

- Ryan Gaiser

- YaGuyALT

I'll be adding the audio snippets so you know who said what sound in the next update!
